title: Forgiveness
description: He almost lost his mate and now he must prove he was worth the cost. Adam almost lost Bay once and not only to the enemy. He pushed her away to protect her but now he’ll do anything to keep her. Bay loves her mate beyond anything and wants him to realize that he’s always had her heart. When Bay’s new powers bring them closer together, they’ll have a chance to see what their mating can truly be. And Adam can finally do the one thing he’s been avoiding. Forgiving himself.
author: Carrie Ann Ryan
